verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will sing to the Lord of the harvest,
I will sing to the Lord of this day,
I will bring to Him thanksgiving and praise,
For we only give Him our best.
We only give him our best.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All our hopes and dreams are found in Him,
All our cares are lost in His presence,
As we weep for joy all people are blessed,
For our hearts are singing within.
Our hearts are singing within.
